data.title: Consulting & Staffing for Legal Projects
data.meta_description: Staff legal projects, optimize delivery teams, and get legal consulting advice from industry experts. Learn how we can help.
data.text:
Take on challenges with world-class legal consulting

Combine legal consulting from our subsidiary, Protiviti, and the largest network of contract talent from Robert Half.

Improve your legal functions

We’ll help you achieve your business goals with strategic guidance, implementation and operational support and workforce optimization services, using adaptable delivery teams that can flex to fit your needs at every stage of your contract, compliance, privacy and litigation projects.

Transform your legal operations

Build next-generation legal capabilities and deliver greater performance and agility in the following areas. Legal department optimization and innovation Corporate transactions Data and privacy strategy Regulatory compliance Environmental, social and corporate governance (ESG)

Implement technologies and processes

Improve your legal function with confidence. Our legal consulting practitioners have deep industry and technical knowledge combined with exceptional project management skills. Contract management solutions Compliance processes Data privacy and cybersecurity Records management solutions Legal process automation Integration, optimization & post-transaction support

Optimize your legal function

Focus on your mission critical activities while our alternative legal services and global operations center optimize efficiency and help reduce costs for you. Our custom-built teams have capabilities that span legal consulting and managed solutions across contract management, compliance, records, privacy, transactions, and investigation-related business challenges. Managed solutions Managed document review Data forensics and electronic discovery Hosting, advanced analytics, AI, and machine learning Spend and vendor risk management Records retention and disposition Legal workflow automation

Build and grow your workforce

Leverage Protiviti’s expert legal consultants and Robert Half’s global network of skilled contract talent to quickly add resources when and where you need them. Consultants with deep subject matter expertise Short- or long-term assignments Contract or permanent talent Full-time engagement professionals

Learn how we have helped businesses like yours

A contract management solution for procurement CLIENT TESTIMONIAL: “We saw improved compliance and eliminated the distraction of managing this ourselves with this relationship.” -Client Process Owner Managed services help drive improvements Protiviti and Robert Half provided a team to help an entertainment organization’s IT procurement division position its contract management function for long-term success and resiliency.

Data privacy and eDiscovery support for GDPR and DSAR compliance Enterprisewide roadmap The team provided a cross-section of privacy, process and technical resources to develop a project plan to roll out updated contracts and technical measures. Long-term consulting relationship A multinational technology company again chose Robert Half and Protiviti to quickly address two critical global compliance challenges driven by the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

eDiscovery support for law firm A team effort The consulting team transferred data to a review platform and assisted the firm’s associates with analysis, productions and deposition preparation. A consulting solution A global law firm engaged Robert Half and Protiviti to provide document processing, hosting and consulting services for a large Federal Trade Commission matter.

Privacy and contracts support for acquisitions Cross-functional approach The team set up a test environment, trained contract professionals, mirrored the client’s CRM template, managed access, and enabled quality control and reporting. A trusted resource Based on a long-standing relationship, Robert Half was brought in to complete contract management work in support of a software company’s latest acquisition.

Managed review and consulting for litigation Optimized review workflow We built a team of 20 experienced attorney reviewers and four project coordinators and worked with outside counsel to develop a quality control process. A reliable, cost-efficient consulting solution A Fortune 500® financial services company who had previously worked with Robert Half reached out for assistance to prepare for a pending large-scale ERISA litigation.

Post-merger contract remediation A multifaceted solution Robert Half Legal Consulting Services developed and delivered a complete post-merger system remediation under budget.

Post-merger due diligence A leading financial institution chose us to help remediate, review and migrate its contract management system into its merger partner's system for enterprise-wide system unformity.
